name: Jetpack Shooter – Oculus Quest 2 VR
description:
Fly anywhere in this open world shooter, kill all zombies and save as many people as possible! This is a free demo/prototype what we made to check if you guys would want a game like this. So please, let us know!

  • This is a self-funded indie project
  • We used ready game assets
  • In the future we would add: campaign missions, modding, online multiplayer, more survival modes, score fight & zen modes
  • Discord: https://discord.gg/nwFp7DUF
  • Email: janos.filai@gmail.com
